data.name: Crypto Arbitrage Bot
data.sub: Working in a Scrum Team with 2-week sprints
data.desc: Worked in a Scrum Team to create a product in a period of 8 2-week sprints. Created a python program to find profitable trades between cryptocurrency exchanges
